title: Teacher-Led Online Course for Enhancing Science Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Process of effectively integrating informal online resources from science museums/centers into school curricula through teacher-led learning pathways

learning_goals: Learners can explain energy resource-related scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy
Learners effectively apply teacher feedback three or more times during problem-solving processes using online science resources
Learners record scores improved by over 15% compared to pre-TGEP implementation in surveys on science learning attitudes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
